entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:11 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 04:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
